name: Schreer Design
description:
In a modern world where people read less and less, graphics have the ability to communicate your message instantly, even across language barriers!
Schreer Design is a full-service design studio, with an extensive knowledge in packaging, communicating with the targeted consumer at shelf level. The talents of the staff have expanded the capabilities of the studio to also include illustration, website design, virtual prototyping and photo-real 3-D rendering.
